column5: Just wondering if anyone knows of a lake or boat launch that isn't frozen? I think I am gonna rip the floor out of my boat and try and find the leak, but I would like to leave myself enough time to fix it by the openers. Any boat launches melted yet in the kawarthas or around Durham area Lake Ontario...
If you want to launch to find your leak, save yourself some time and fill your bilge with water. If it leaks in, it will also leak out in the same spot.
I had a leaky boat before and I tried that and it wouldn't leak when filled with water but in the water it would leak
If its not too far from you, take a drive down to the boat launch in whitby... sometimes that one clears out early with the right wind
jedi, there is lots of open water at Frenchman's Bay in Pickering... i didn't notice the ramp though...i should be down there at some point in the next 4 or 5 days, i'll send you a PM if it's clear.
